articles.title: Meeting Held in France to Remember Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Venezuela-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group Inaugurated 
    Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- The Venezuela-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group was inaugurated on Sept. 7 in Caracas. 
 Freddy Jose Roque Carreno was elected chairman of the group, Hernan Pinango its vice-chairman, Berkis Claret its administrative coordinator and Felix Velasquez its executive secretary.

articles.title: 57th Birthday of DPRK Celebrated
articles.content:
Meeting Held in France to Remember Kim Jong Suk 
    Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting was held by the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on September 5 on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of death of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the group, said in a report that   Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero, opened a brilliant chapter in the modern history of Korea. 
 The speaker said that she not only fought against the aggressors until the liberation of Korea by displaying matchless bravery as a renowned crack shot in the entire period of the armed struggle but contributed to uniting people of various strata under the banner of anti-Japanese armed struggle as an able political worker.    
 It was the greatest exploit performed by her that she protected General Kim Il Sung politically and ideologically at the risk of her life and gave birth to Kim Jong Il, providing a sure guarantee for a bright future of Korea, and brought him up in the crucible of the anti-Japanese war, the speaker stressed, and added:
 The history of modern Korea which shines under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, successor to President Kim Il Sung, is closely associated with her exploits. 
 Short as her life was, her immortal feats and august name will shine forever along with prospering socialist Korea, the speaker concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Laos
articles.content:
57th Birthday of DPRK Celebrated 
    Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Meetings, film shows and round-table talks were held by the Study Association on the DPRK of the Asia-Africa Institute under Moscow M. V. Lomonosov State University, the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, the Parliamentary Group of the Brazilian Communist Party and the Brazilian Industrial Workers Union, the Belarus Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Uganda-DPRK Friendship Association from August 31 to Sept. 6 on the occasion of the 57th birthday of the DPRK. 
 The chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India said in his speech at the meeting that the DPRK founding was a historic event of great significance in carving out the destiny of the Korean people.    
 Speakers at the meeting and the round-table talks held in Brazil said that the DPRK founded by President Kim Il Sung is the most dignified authoritative independent state in the world, a people-centered socialist state guaranteeing the popular masses genuine political rights and freedom and serving them and a peace-loving state in which the leader, the WPK and the people are single-mindedly united and all of them live in harmony, helping and leading forward each other. Thanks to the Songun politics pursued by leader Kim Jong Il the Korean people have achieved great victory by frustrating the U.S. moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK, they stressed.
 Speakers at the meetings held in Russia, Belarus and Uganda expressed the belief that the future of the DPRK would be rosier under the banner of Songun.
 Participants of film shows watched DPRK films "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il gives on-the-spot guidance to the work in different fields" and the "55th birthday of the DPRK".    
 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings held in Russia and Belarus.

Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Laos 
    Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was brought out in booklet by the Lao State Publishing House on Sept. 15.
 The work, made public on October 3, Juche 79 (1990), clarifies the idea that the leadership of the party is a sure guarantee for the victory of the cause of socialism, the issue of strengthening the WPK into the revolutionary party of Juche type, the basic way for the Party to perform its mission and duty as a leading political organization and others.

Russian Ensemble Gives Its Premiere
    Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- The visiting State Academy Ensemble of the Ministry of Interior of Russia gave its premiere at the Ponghwa Art Theatre Wednesday. 
 The prestigious ensemble of Russia came to the DPRK again with a colorful repertoire including vocal and instrumental music and dances they have sincerely prepared with profound respect for the peerlessly great persons and the warm friendship of the Russian people towards the Korean people in the wake of its successful art presentations and performance tours of hero cities in the period of the Soviet Union in celebration of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War. 
 The performance was appreciated by Ju Sang Song, minister of People's Security, Kwon Hyok Bong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city.    
 Among the audience were Oleg Davydov, charge d' affaires a. i., and staff members of the Russian embassy here. 
 The ensemble's repertoire included colorful numbers such as wartime songs "Just War," "Song of the Soviet Army" and Russian songs well known to the Koreans "The Evening in the Suburbs of Moscow" and "The Song of Defenders of Moscow" and dances "Kazak Dance," "Market in Russia" and "Moscow Dance Music." 
 The artistes sang well Korean songs "My Blessed Life", "I Think about You" and "Song of Sea" to the delight of the audience. The performance was prevalent with an atmosphere of DPRK-Russia friendship.    
 The performance continues.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
FM Paek Nam Sun Meets Pakistani Ambassador
    Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun Thursday met and had a talk with Noorullah Khan, new Pakistani ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him.
 On hand were officials concerned and a staff member of the Pakistani embassy here. 
e092213 - Wreaths Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk    
 Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in the Revolutionary Martyr's Cemetery on Mt. Taesong Thursday on the occasion of her 56th death anniversary.
 Seen standing there was a wreath sent by leader Kim Jong Il. 
 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were senior officials of the Party, the state and the army, chairpersons of the friendly parties, members of the Cabinet, leading officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and others.
 On hand were overseas compatriots staying in the socialist homeland.
 Wreaths in the name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK were placed before the bust of    Kim Jong Suk amid the playing of the wreath-laying music.
 Wreaths and bouquets were also laid there in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army, science, education, public health and media organs, the Joint National Organization of the Korean Children's Union, party and power bodies, factories and farms in the city, and delegations and home-visiting groups of overseas compatriots.    
 Written on the ribbons of the wreaths were letters "The revolutionary exploits of anti-Japanese war hero Comrade Kim Jong Suk are immortal!"
 They paid silent tribute to the memory of the noble revolutionary life of Kim Jong Suk who devoted her whole life to a struggle for the liberation of Korea and the freedom and happiness of the people and gave a sure guarantee for the rosy future of the revolutionary cause of Juche.    
 Meanwhile, floral baskets were laid before her statues in Kim Jong Suk County, Hoeryong City, Kim Jong Suk Naval Academy and Kim Jong Suk General Military School.
